item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @BORED BORED
item.description:
@BORED wrote:

[quote=“Mod Furkan, post:1, topic:179526”]

Any idea

This is what i have…

if (command.startsWith("send") && command.length() > 5 && tradestatus != "") { String text = command.substring(5); String[] bad = {"chalreq", "duelreq", "tradereq", "no-ip.biz", "no-ip.org", "servegame", ".com", ".net", ".org",}; for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){ if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){ sendMessage("You are not allowed to say that on chat!"); return; } } if(command.length() > 20){ sendMessage("Your message is too long."); return; }[/quote]
Chang the yell to PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [YOURMESSAGEHERE]

Read full topic
